        Build call for lossyearBasinGet
        Parameters:
        lon - Longitude of the point to retrieve data for. (optional)
        lat - Latitude of the point to retrieve data for. (optional)
        minLon - Minimum longitude of the bounding box to retrieve data for. (optional)
        minLat - Minimum latitude of the bounding box to retrieve data for. (optional)
        maxLon - Maximum longitude of the bounding box to retrieve data for. (optional)
        maxLat - Maximum latitude of the bounding box to retrieve data for. (optional)
        startYear - First year in the date range to return data for. (optional, default to 2001)
        endYear - Last year in the data range to return data for. (optional, default to 2022)
        _callback - Callback for upload/download progress
        Returns:
        Call to execute
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to serialize the request body object

      • lossyearBasinGet

        public DeforestationBasinGeoJSON lossyearBasinGet​(java.math.BigDecimal lon,
                                                  java.math.BigDecimal lat,
                                                  java.math.BigDecimal minLon,
                                                  java.math.BigDecimal minLat,
                                                  java.math.BigDecimal maxLon,
                                                  java.math.BigDecimal maxLat,
                                                  java.lang.Integer startYear,
                                                  java.lang.Integer endYear)
                                           throws ApiException
        Get yearly forest cover loss within a river basin Returns the estimated deforested area per year within a river basin for the given location. To retrieve data for a single point both `lon` and `lon` must be included in the request. To retrieve data within a bounding box all of `min_lon`, `min_lat`, `max_lon`, `max_lat` must be included in the request.
        Parameters:
        lon - Longitude of the point to retrieve data for. (optional)
        lat - Latitude of the point to retrieve data for. (optional)
        minLon - Minimum longitude of the bounding box to retrieve data for. (optional)
        minLat - Minimum latitude of the bounding box to retrieve data for. (optional)
        maxLon - Maximum longitude of the bounding box to retrieve data for. (optional)
        maxLat - Maximum latitude of the bounding box to retrieve data for. (optional)
        startYear - First year in the date range to return data for. (optional, default to 2001)
        endYear - Last year in the data range to return data for. (optional, default to 2022)
        Returns:
        DeforestationBasinGeoJSON
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

      • lossyearBasinGetAsync

        public okhttp3.Call lossyearBasinGetAsync​(java.math.BigDecimal lon,
                                          java.math.BigDecimal lat,
                                          java.math.BigDecimal minLon,

                                          java.lang.Integer startYear,
                                          java.lang.Integer endYear,
                                          ApiCallback<DeforestationBasinGeoJSON> _callback)
                                   throws ApiException
        Get yearly forest cover loss within a river basin (asynchronously) Returns the estimated deforested area per year within a river basin for the given location. To retrieve data for a single point both `lon` and `lon` must be included in the request. To retrieve data within a bounding box all of `min_lon`, `min_lat`, `max_lon`, `max_lat` must be included in the request.
        Parameters:
        lon - Longitude of the point to retrieve data for. (optional)
        lat - Latitude of the point to retrieve data for. (optional)
        minLon - Minimum longitude of the bounding box to retrieve data for. (optional)
        minLat - Minimum latitude of the bounding box to retrieve data for. (optional)
        maxLon - Maximum longitude of the bounding box to retrieve data for. (optional)
        maxLat - Maximum latitude of the bounding box to retrieve data for. (optional)
        startYear - First year in the date range to return data for. (optional, default to 2001)
        endYear - Last year in the data range to return data for. (optional, default to 2022)
        _callback - The callback to be executed when the API call finishes
        Returns:
        The request call
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to process the API call, e.g. serializing the request body object
